A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was an absolute joy to watch. This movie explored in depth the characters and as a full-out Star Wars fan it reminded me why I love Star Wars so much. The character development impactful storyline and a few jokes along the way. I watched this movie at the midnight screening and it kept me on edge the whole time even when it was 12 in the morning. This movie is definitely a must-see and is awesome.
